prolog:
:- dynamic edge/2, path/3.

edge(a, b).
edge(b, c).
edge(c, d).
edge(a, e).
edge(e, f).
edge(f, d).
edge(d, g).
edge(g, h).

member(X, [X|_]).
member(X, [_|T]) :- member(X, T).

path(X, Y, Path) :- travel(X, Y, [X], Path).

travel(X, X, Visited, Visited).
travel(X, Y, Visited, Path) :-
    edge(X, Z),
    \+ member(Z, Visited),
    travel(Z, Y, [Z|Visited], Path).
